CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 5, 1954, page 1, reads: "...Courier's gala third annual Home Service Fair slated for Hunt Armory June 10,11 and 12..."
TitMainTitle: Men and women entering doorway of Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
